Game information:

The room was shrouded in smoke and smelled
of gunpowder and burning flesh ...
Hard to believe that a further 30 seconds
back here was calm and even cozy ...
When smokescreen melted, the smell of
blood was added landscape ...
Seven people in 30 seconds turned into mush ...
Eighth stood spattered with blood, before the door ...
for which there was a road leading to hell!
Are you ready to take his place?

Repack Features:

Cold Zero: The Last Stand
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
